| **Path**                              | **Audience**  | **Methods**            | **Purpose / Expected Behaviour**                                                                                                                     |
| ------------------------------------- | ------------- | ---------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `/`                                   | Admin / Guest | GET                    | **Auth gate.** If admin session exists → render Dashboard. Otherwise redirect to `/login`.                                                           |
| `/logout`                             | Admin         | POST                   | End session → redirect to `/login`.                                                                                                                  |
| `/settings`                           | Admin         | GET                    | Settings hub with links to sub-sections.                                                                                                             |
| `/settings/categories`                | Admin         | GET, POST, PUT, DELETE | Manage picture categories (list, create, update, delete).                                                                                            |
| `/settings/picture-sizes`             | Admin         | GET, POST, PUT, DELETE | Manage available picture sizes.                                                                                                                      |
| `/settings/users`                     | Admin         | GET, POST, DELETE      | List admin accounts; create new admin; delete another admin.                                                                                         |
| `/settings/users/{id}/suspend`        | Admin         | POST                   | Suspend **another** admin account. **Must reject if `{id}` equals current admin's ID.**                                                              |
| `/settings/users/{id}/unsuspend`      | Admin         | POST                   | Reactivate a suspended admin. **Must reject if `{id}` equals current admin's ID.**                                                                   |
| `/settings/users/{id}`                | Admin         | DELETE                 | Delete an admin account. **Must reject if `{id}` equals current admin's ID.**                                                                        |
| `/pictures`                           | Admin         | GET, POST, PUT, DELETE | Manage pictures (list, upload, edit, delete).                                                                                                        |
| `/events`                             | Admin         | GET, POST, PUT, DELETE | Manage events (list, create, update, delete).                                                                                                        |
| `/events/{id}/access`                 | Admin         | GET, POST              | Create or manage event access codes.                                                                                                                 |
| `/events-access/{id}`                 | Admin         | PATCH, DELETE          | Toggle or revoke an access code.                                                                                                                     |
| `/orders`                             | Admin         | GET, PUT, DELETE       | View and manage orders.                                                                                                                              |
| `/orders/{id}`                        | Admin         | GET                    | View order details including pictures and totals.                                                                                                    |
| `/login`                              | Guest         | GET, POST              | Dual-entry page: left panel = admin login (success → `/` dashboard); right panel = guest access-code form (post → `/verify-access-code`).            |
| `/verify-access-code`                 | Guest         | GET                    | Validate access code via query parameter; success → `/events/private_events/{event_name}?access_code={code}`; failure → back to `/login` with error. |
| `/public-events`                      | Public        | GET                    | List all public events available without authentication.                                                                                             |
| `/events/public_events/{event_name}`  | Public        | GET                    | Display a specific **public event** (e.g. `marathon_finish_line`); shows details and pictures without access code.                                   |
| `/events/private_events/{event_name}` | Public        | GET                    | Display a **private event** for guests with a valid `access_code` query parameter; invalid or missing code → error message or redirect to `/login`.  |
| `/events/{path}`                      | Public        | GET                    | Fallback route for nested or shareable URLs; must still enforce visibility and permissions.                                                          |
